red.comment: Red for key branded moments throughout the product as our primary brand color.

deep-red.comment: Darkest red for key branded moments throughout the product.

mid-red.comment: Mid red for key branded moments throughout the product.

purple.comment: Main purple for secondary actions and brand elements.

purple-dark.comment: Dark purple for interactive elements. Can also be used for limited floods of color.

purple-deep.comment: Deep purple for interactive elements. Can also be used for limited floods of color.

purple-lightest.comment: Lightest purple for interactive elements. Can also be used for limited floods of color.

green.comment: Use to communicate a positive status or message.

blue.comment: Use to communicate an informative status or message.

pink.comment: Use to communicate an error status or message.

yellow.comment: Use to communicate an urgent status or message. Be sure to follow accessibility guidelines when using this color.

white.comment: White for floods of color and accents, like backgrounds and cards.

black.comment: Black for main text color, specifically in headline and body copy.

90.comment: Black at 90%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

80.comment: Black at 80%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

70.comment: Black at 70%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

60.comment: Black at 60%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

50.comment: Black at 50%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

40.comment: Black at 40%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

30.comment: Black at 30%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

20.comment: Black at 20%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

10.comment: Black at 10%. Use this gray in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.

gray.comment: Lightest gray. Use in combination with content hierarchy, font-weight and background color to create AA accessible text.
